hook.text: Anorexia has the highest death rate of any psychiatric illness â€” up to 10 percent.

buildup.text: It involves severe food restriction, intense fear of weight gain, and distorted body image.

discovery.text: The brain of someone with anorexia literally sees a larger body than what exists.

twist.text: Atypical anorexia involves the same behaviors and dangers but at a normal or higher weight.

climax.text: Starvation damages the heart, bones, brain, and every organ system in the body.

punchline.text: The mirror lies. The damage is real.

quiz.question: What makes anorexia the most lethal psychiatric illness?
options: It has up to a 10 percent mortality rate
